settings.main_text: "Our overall experience with Shawn and Chase of Electric Eye has been amazing. They're experts in their field and have really helped us grow our online business."

"When my company was transitioning from Squarespace to Shopify, Electric Eye took the reins and made the transition fast, smooth and efficient. They were also very knowledgable with online commerce in general and I have gained significant revenue by following their lead and asking for advice."

"Working with Electric Eye has furthered our web business beyond my original expectations. Thanks to Electric Eye and their advertising techniques, we can pinpoint the precise customers we are looking to target and really go after the business."

"Before working with Electric Eye our Ad strategy and practices were a complete mess. They were able to help restructure our strategy and implement best practices that have put us on track to have the most profitable year in the history of our company."

Shawn and Chase helped fulfill all of my SEO and digital marketing requests, and even helped me learn about more opportunities for improvement for my shop that I had not known existed. I'd recommend them to anyone."

"Shawn and Chase were great to work with!
They are very knowledgeable and created an awesome site for us."

"Chase and Shawn are a great team to work with. They are knowledgable and experienced and went the extra mile to make sure our marketing efforts were successful. We will continue to use them in the future."

"Working with Electric Eye has been nothing short of exceptional. Within the timeframe of our business relationship I've witnessed firsthand our sales increase. I'll look forward to continue to work and grow with Electric Eye in the future.

Chase and Shawn specialize in Facebook/Instagram marketing and are most definitely experts on Shopify...they have been so helpful and flexible with their services, customizing to our small business' needs. Highly recommended!

"Electric Eye's expertise was instrumental in the initial design and set up of our store. They have continued to help boost our sales and further grow our loyal customer base with their elite understanding of Shopify. We look forward to our continued success with them as a part of our team."

After a long search for the right development team, I was so happy to find Chase + Shawn. Not only are they attentive and punctual, they think beyond the initial scope of the project to be sure no opportunities are missed for a great user experience. I'm excited to work with them again on more projects going forward.

settings.sub_text: Electric Eye are certified Shopify Experts, so you can be assured your project will run smoothly. We guarantee it, literally. Whether you are looking to jump start your new e-commerce business or migrate an existing one, Electric Eye is here to help you every step of the way.

settings.rich_text:
A good design does wonders for sales. From setting up premium themes to custom theme development, Electric Eye will design your Shopify site to succeed from the start.

Already have a Shopify store, but not impressed by its performance? Many times a pre-existing Shopify store can beneﬁt from an overhaul. Improving your existing Shopify store can lead increased conversions.

Every business has unique problems that need custom solutions. Electric Eye will solve your Shopify issue with custom development.

settings.title: Sign up to our newsletter
settings.text: Receive special offers and first look at new products.

settings.sub_text: Unfortunately, traditional enterprise ecommerce solutions are just broken. Antiquated technologies, costly custom builds, crashed sites during crucial hours, and infrastructure that burns through server resources.  The good news is Shopify Plus is not one of these old solutions.  Electric Eye utilizes Shopify Plus to give you a multi-channel platform with unmatched scalability so you can grow your business, instead of worrying about your website.

settings.rich_text:
Customization

Shopify Plus allows customization of your store design, checkout pages, and backend. If you dream it up, we can make it happen with our Shopify certified development team.

Easy Management

With an easy to use backend, there’s no need to hire third party management to run your daily operations. Members of your staff can easily learn to upload and manage products without code. Save time and money on repetitive IT tasks like maintaining performance and monitoring risks.

Sell Everywhere

Launch new sales channels across social, mobile, and in real life with a single click. Go global through dedicated storefronts in multiple languages and currencies. Set up wholesale for high-volume buyers easily.

features to meet your unique business needs.
Acquire customers and retain them. We target the right audiences to maximize ROI.
We improve your businesses efficiencies and marketing efforts with automation.

Rely on us to actualize the path toward meeting your business goals and objectives.

settings.title: About
settings.subheading: Electric Eye helps brands grow with stunning ecommerce design and smart marketing.

settings.richtext:
Electric Eye is a boutique agency focused on helping brands grow their online sales. We are certified Shopify Experts who provide well-designed, data-driven solutions, allowing our clients to worry less about technology, and focus on running their business.

The agency was founded from our passion to help solve problems. Our process starts with site optimization through design and development, followed by marketing & automation efforts to accelerate growth. Clients appreciate our dedication, and the results we provide through tangible revenue.

Electric Eye is a small agency by choice. This allows their tight-knit team to work directly with key decision makers to quickly generate ROI for their clients.

settings.title: What we do
settings.text: Electric Eye are eCommerce designers, developers, and marketers that are passionate about increasing your profits. We offer a variety of services that are custom tailored to grow your Shopify business.

settings.item_content: Our design team will ensure a professional looking website, customized for your brand.
Our development team is fully capable of executing customized features to meet your needs.
Acquire customers and retain them. We effectively reach the right audiences to maximize ROIs.
We can implement automation into marketing campaigns to take monotonous tasks off of your plate.
We set up Shopify stores comprehensively and efficiently for a quick-to-market solution.
Rely on Shopify Experts to actualize the path toward meeting your business goals and objectives.

settings.text:
Our Website is not intended for children under 13 years of age. No one under age 13 may provide any information to the Website. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are under 13, do not use or provide any information on this Website, make any purchases through the Website, or provide any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, or email address.

If we learn we have collected or received personal information from a child under 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 13, please contact us at at info@electriceye.io.

settings.heading: Want more sales? Follow our 8-point guide.
settings.section_content: Subscribe to our newsletter and recieve our 8-point actionable guide for increasing conversions and building trust with your customers on any Shopify product page for FREE.

settings.text: Electric Eye is very proud to partner with innovative software partners within the Shopify ecosystem. Our team is very familiar with these programs and use them everyday. Third party apps can add functionality to your ecommerce store without spending a fortune on custom development. They have been quality assured with many hours of testing, so you don't have to worry about your site breaking. Support teams have also been put in place in case anything goes wrong.

settings.faq_content: We are a digital agency that specializes in the Shopify platform.
We help eCommerce brands grow through design, development, and marketing.
We are available for our clients Monday - Friday from 9am to 5pm EST. Evenings and weekends are reserved for our free time, family, and friends.

settings.faq_title: What is Shopify and why do you love it?
settings.faq_content: Shopify is an eCommerce platform that we feel is the best option for our clients.

settings.faq_title: What if we're not on Shopify? Can you help us?
settings.faq_content: Absolutely. We’ve helped migrate businesses from other platforms, such as Squarespace, WordPress, and Magento over to Shopify. If you are not looking to replatform, we can make some introductions to other teams more suited to help you.
We do not typically charge by the hour. Our expertise brings a lot of value to our clients beyond what can be measured in an hourly rate.

settings.faq_title: How do you know what to charge?
settings.faq_content: We bill on a per-project basis. We prefer value-based pricing that corresponds with the ROI you will get by using our services.

No, and you should be wary of any company who guarantees results. Most of what drives a successful project is outside of an agency’s control. We can, however, use your data to show you the opportunity at hand.
Our work is 100% guaranteed, and if you are not completely satisfied at the end of the project we will do our best to make things right.

settings.faq_title: Can we work out a profit-sharing percentage based deal?
settings.faq_content: No. At this time, we only work on a fee-for-service basis.
Please see our case studies for testimonials and results. We are wary of divulging our full client list and contact information.

settings.faq_title: How quickly can you build a Shopify Store?
settings.faq_content: Every project is unique and we always properly scope and estimate a timeline for each and every business engagement. While these are only estimates, we pride ourselves on our operational efficiencies and the quality of our work.
Probably not. We need to understand the entire project first to be able to quote an accurate timeline, which is usually a best case scenario launch date.

settings.faq_title: Who owns the work you create?
settings.faq_content: You do. We are here to help you succeed and you can take what we create with you after our project is completed.

settings.faq_title: Do you create content or copywriting?
settings.faq_content: No, but we can refer you to our network of trusted professionals to ensure these needs are met.

settings.faq_title: Do you require a lengthy commitment for your retainers?
settings.faq_content: No. However, we do require a 3 month commitment on retainers so we can properly analyze all of your data. After that, we are happy to go month-to-month.
Our founders are in Columbus, Ohio, and the rest of the team is spread out all over the world!
Our co-founders maintain a network of badass, elite freelancers who are specialists in their own areas so we can assemble the perfect dream team for every project.

settings.faq_title: How long have you been in business?
settings.faq_content: The agency was founded in October of 2016, however our founders have nearly 20 years of experience as entrepreneurs, corporate employees, and freelancers in retail, apparel, and events. We've learned a thing or two along the way and can’t wait to share it with you!

settings.text_subtitle: The only official Shopify Meetup in Ohio.

settings.text:
The Shopify Meetup Columbus is hosted by local Shopify Experts to share knowledge with the growing Shopify enthusiast community. The bi-monthly meetings are free and open to everyone.

With education at the forefront, each event features three speakers, offers networking opportunities, and free food and drinks. Attendees range from seasoned eCommerce experts to budding entrepreneurs, all brought together under one roof to learn about Shopify.

Park in the lot on the west side of the building and walk to the front entrance on State Street. Come in the building and up the stairs to your right. We will have wayfinding signs and a greeter to help you.

Columbus Idea Foundry

The Idea Foundry is both a physical place – 60,000 sq ft of workshops and offices; working nooks, classrooms and communal spaces – and a state of mind; the belief that each of us has the potential to bring our ideas to life if given the space, the equipment and the support to empower our inner maker.

settings.information_content:
Columbus Idea Foundry

421 W. State St.

Columbus, OH 43215
Bi-monthly
There is a free surface parking lot on the west side of the building.

.store domain names are created for retail & ecommerce. Join 180,000+ businesses such as Nike & Emirates and get a .store domain name.
Shogun helps you optimize your eCommerce business with high-converting landing pages and a powerful visual page builder.
Shopify is a complete commerce platform that enables you to start a business, grow and manage it.
Don't leave your customers waiting. Get high quality answers to your customer emails and chats for $2.25 per resolution.

settings.information_content: It is completely free.
Yes, we film every event and you might show up in pictures or video.
Yes, we’ll have free food and refreshments.
settings.information_title: Will there be food and drink?

settings.information_content: Possibly, contact info@electriceye.io to apply.
settings.information_title: Can I speak at a future event?

settings.information_content: No tickets are needed. We’d love for you to RSVP on meetup.com so we can know how much pizza to buy.
settings.information_title: Do I need tickets or to RSVP?

settings.information_content: Definitely, contact info@electriceye.io for more information.
settings.information_title: Can I sponsor a future event?

settings.information_content: We have three speakers, q+a, and time to network at each event.
Yes, of course everyone is welcome to join and learn.
settings.information_title: I’m don’t use Shopify, can I attend?

The good news is Shopify Plus is not one of these old solutions. Electric Eye utilizes Shopify Plus to give you a multi-channel platform with unmatched scalability so you can grow your business, instead of worrying about your website.

settings.information_title: What platforms can you help me on?

settings.information_content: We charge a flat fee vs 20% of your media spend.
Unfortunately, that’s not a viable business model for us right now.
settings.information_title: Will you consider a performance based payment structure?

settings.information_content: Honestly, it really depends. We strive for quickest results. We say 3 months is the minimum timeline it takes to collect solid data for any meaningful assessment.
settings.information_title: How long does it take to see returns?

settings.information_content: Unless you're funded, you should be a $250k+ business for this type of engagement.
We recommend a solid feed software for optimal results. It's not very expensive.
settings.information_title: Do I have to pay for additional software?

settings.information_title: Do I have to use a credit card?

settings.information_content: Unfortunately, no. We link your credit card so you can directly pay for ad spends.
settings.information_title: Can I reimburse you for ad spends?

settings.information_content: Short answer is yes but this is a very open ended question. Contact us and we’d be happy to help.

settings.testimonial: Before working with Electric Eye our ad strategy and practices were a complete mess. They were able to help restructure our strategy and implement best practices that have put us on track to the most profitable year in the history of our company.

The team at Electric Eye demonstrated exemplary professionalism while working with us to implement the automated email marketing program. They are also very honest and great communicators. I highly recommend working with them.
Helped streetwear brand achieve 15x average return with Facebook Ads and increase online sales by 45%.
Design and Marketing for Upper West Side Sneaker Retailer that led to a 52% increase in total sales.

settings.text_subtitle: No hidden fees. No hourly rate.
settings.text_paragraph:
Electric Eye believes in transparent pricing. We have custom built our service offerings to be the best value for business owners and give you the power to stay in budget.

We offer continued monthly support with our Shopify Expert Retainers, as well as project based services that you can choose a la carte. Start with roadmapping and we'll help you determine exactly what services your business needs to grow.
